body.description: VANGOGER smart handheld steamer can adjust temperature and steam power with its intelligent controller, suitable for all kinds of fabrics. It heats up quickly and efficiently flattens wrinkles. With its sleek design, it is an ideal choice for you. The steamer operates on 120V with 1000W heating power and has a 120ml water tank capacity.Garment steamer and flat ironing style 2-in-1Handle can rotate 180 degreesWater pump supplyElectronic screen displayCeramic textureOne click opening, convenient and fast1000W heating fast steam output100ml water tank1.5M long power cordPortable cloth bag for convenient storageWater cup accessories, convenient water supply

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purchase ever!
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Use the hot pan that comes with it…. you’ll need it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this but it is definitely very small. Mini is accurate. It works just as described though. The water tank is obviously small so you will need to refill if you need to do a lot of clothes or a very large item it may take some time. It heats quickly but comes with a stand to sit it on. I like that it can also work as a regular iron as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mini iron for travel!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the VANGOGER Mini Steam Iron for my travels and I am extremely satisfied with its performance. The dual ironing styles make it versatile for all my ironing needs. Whether I need to steam my clothes while hanging or iron them flat, this mini iron does it all. The 180° rotating handle is a great feature that allows for comfortable and easy use in any position. The one-click opening design makes refilling the water tank a breeze. In terms of performance, this mini iron heats up quickly and delivers fast and powerful steam output, making ironing efficient and effortless. The portable and convenient design, with a long power cord and included cloth bag, makes it easy to store and carry during travel. I highly recommend this mini steam iron for anyone in need of a compact and reliable ironing solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Iron is great for small jobs
reviews.reviewText: First of all, this mini iron is a beautiful piece of work. I have the white with copper trim. Even the electric cord is beautiful. It is wrapped in some sort of fabric material. I got it because the picture they show made it look like lots of steam is coming out and that it can be used as a steamer to steam your clothes and get rid of the wrinkle. Unfortunately, it did not do this for me. It does a great job at ironing and getting the wrinkles out but it did not just steam the wrinkles out without ironing. You plug it in and it is on. There is only one button and that is to turn the steam on. It will make some noises for a little bit before steam comes out. There’s a base that you can put it on in between ironing. It’s not designed to sit any other way. You will have to remember to unplug it once you’re done because it will stay on. It also comes with a small cup to pour water in. You should always use distilled water with any iron otherwise it will be clogged with minerals and is pretty much impossible to clean out. It also comes with a nice traveling bag that you can put everything in. I don’t think that I will use this to travel since I don’t want to carry another thing with me but I will probably use this at home for small items. Also, most hotels have an iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Está súper chiquita, pero funciona súper bien. La calidad es excelente.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is going back! I bought it to take on my cruise to steam my dress for elegant night, filled the reservoir with less than the max water line and it all leaked out through the holes in the bottom and around the sides. Heats up fast but what good does it do if the water leaks out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it I thank it's much better then iron it's small for travel and it's powerful steam is amazing
